articles.title: 'It used to be cocaine and strippers': Robbie Williams swaps rock star lifestyle for painting - Daily Mail
articles.description: The singer, 48, has spoke out about the positive impact painting has had on his mental health. He revealed that when he spends time working on his art it silences the voices in his head.
